# Koer Document

**Koer - Construction & Rental Industrial Vehicles WordPress Theme**

![screenshot](./img/screenshot.avif)

Koer is a premium WordPress theme dedicated to Industrial, Building and Construction Businesses, Rental Vehicle Services, Machinery and Mechanics Business, Construction Services and other related businesses.

Koer will give your website a professional look that will allow you to stand firmly in your competitive market, featuring a great look, contemporary feel and smooth overall user experience. The responsive layout will ensure that your company appears beautifully across a variety of devices.
